title: Eric Adams Says Migrant Shelter on Randalls Island Will Close
description: Mayor Eric Adams announced on Thursday that the city would take down the 84,400-square-foot facility and reopen a new migrant center in Midtown Manhattan.
dc:creator: Liam Stack

media:content.media:credit: David Dee Delgado for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: The Randalls Island Humanitarian Emergency Response Center opened on Oct. 19 and held 500 beds for single men, along with a recreation area, cafeteria and laundry facilities.
